name: MINIREVENGE: DADDY ISSUES
description:
A Young Circle Name MINI who lives in a small village loses his family and village friends while he went out to get something for the villagers. He was so mad he wanted to figure out who did so he packed everything and went on an adventure to find the killer. not knowing what was going to happen he he walked a long journey,  He finds a space Like weapon a weapon that a god would have he holds it an is granted with the power of the gods. he finds his father and figures out that his father was one of the people or gods who killed his family, Yes his father became a god. Then he and his father had a Marvelous battle.

A Rage Simple Top Down Shooter Game Controls are Simple 

W=Up

A=Left

S=Down

D=Right

Mouse=Look Around

MouseClickLeft=Shoot

Bugs: When u press resume it freezes so just press esc then it will un pause it will do it for other stuff to so just press esc.

if your game freezes on the loading screen just restart it then it will load.

Thank You For Playing This Game. This is my first game ever so i hope this game is at least decent i think its good but you guys opinion matter to.
